name: MrButler
0:
”Alexa, tell Mr Butler that I put my wallet in my backpack.”
”Alexa, ask Mr Butler where my wallet is.”
”Alexa, tell Mr Butler to forget my wallet.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: mister butler
des: Forget where you put your car keys? Your sunglasses? The flour? Butler is an easy-to-use item location reminder. Simply tell Butler where you put an item and Butler will remember next time you ask!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
